00023 
00024 #ifndef SPI_SLAVE_HS_ARCH_H
00025 #define SPI_SLAVE_HS_ARCH_H
00026 
00027 /*
00028 
00029   Highspeed SPI Slave Interface
00030   SS on P0.20
00031   Circular Buffer
00032 
00033 */
00034 
00035 #include "std.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 #define SpiEnable() {   \
00039     SetBit(SSPCR1, SSE);  \
00040   }
00041 
00042 #define SpiDisable() {    \
00043     ClearBit(SSPCR1, SSE);  \
00044   }
00045 
00046 
00047 #define SPI_SLAVE_HS_RX_BUFFER_SIZE 256
00048 
00049 extern uint16_t spi_slave_hs_rx_insert_idx, spi_slave_hs_rx_extract_idx;
00050 extern uint8_t spi_slave_hs_rx_buffer[SPI_SLAVE_HS_RX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00051 
00052 #define SpiSlaveChAvailable() (spi_slave_hs_rx_insert_idx != spi_slave_hs_rx_extract_idx)
00053 
00054 #define SpiSlaveGetch() ({\
00055    uint8_t ret = spi_slave_hs_rx_buffer[spi_slave_hs_rx_extract_idx]; \
00056    spi_slave_hs_rx_extract_idx = (spi_slave_hs_rx_extract_idx + 1)%SPI_SLAVE_HS_RX_BUFFER_SIZE;        \
00057    ret;                                                 \
00058 })
00059 
00060 #define SPI_SLAVE_HS_TX_BUFFER_SIZE 64
00061 
00062 extern uint8_t spi_slave_hs_tx_insert_idx, spi_slave_hs_tx_extract_idx;
00063 extern uint8_t spi_slave_hs_tx_buffer[SPI_SLAVE_HS_TX_BUFFER_SIZE];
00064 
00065 #define SpiSlaveTransmit(data) {\
00066   uint8_t temp = (spi_slave_hs_tx_insert_idx + 1) % SPI_SLAVE_HS_TX_BUFFER_SIZE; \
00067   if (temp != spi_slave_hs_tx_extract_idx)  /* there is room left */  \
00068   { \
00069     spi_slave_hs_tx_buffer[spi_slave_hs_tx_insert_idx] = (uint8_t)data; \
00070     spi_slave_hs_tx_insert_idx = temp; \
00071   } \
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 #endif
